As for why NTR is popular. That kind of emotional pain is somewhat a rare feeling. There are tons of sweet drama, joyous stories, good action movies etc. that you can get pretty much every kind of feeling a lot. But NTR feeling can't be found easily. They can't show everything in betrayal stories so it's as effective, and there is no story, so no NTR feeling normal porn. The only place you can get that feeling is here NTR hentai. People with a loooooot of leisure time crave for new feelings (one of the common suicide reason), like after seeing saddest work, you want more sad stories, or after some very dark stories you want some darkness. Because their taste is different and you need something different.

"Chad, Girl-Hunter, Playboy" type or "Anime-weeb, degenerate, introvert" type. Imagine your crush is stolen behind your back, while you are at home etc. You have no way of knowing it. Any introvert people or even extrovert people waiting for courage to confess can be NTR protagonist, if they are unlucky. Less interaction with humans more likely that sth is going on behind your back. Especially in this quarantine times everyone in this site can relate to NTR MC.

@ScrubKing I think you're making a wrong assumption when you say  "assuming the vast majority of readers that dont hate it do it exactly because they cant relate to the cuck in the first place". I personally believe NTR is very popular because there are a lot of people who get off on emotional pain and humiliation, otherwise known as "masochists".  Masochism doesn't only apply to physical pain but emotional pain as well, and I can assure you there is a whole boatload of people out there, even in REAL LIFE and not just in hentai fantasy, who get off on and fetishize being hurt emotionally by infidelity. If you search online, there are several communities who participate not in being the "cucker" but in actively being "cucked", as in they get off on being the NTR victim. In fact, the only reason NTR is so interesting for me personally is because of the emotional pain that it causes. In my view, people who enjoy NTR "from the perspective of the bull or the stealer" to be too vanilla.

@Amariithynar. And im assuming the vast majority of readers that dont hate it do it exacly because they cant relate to the cuck in the first place. riddle me this . ive seen people explain their consumtion of this material in the way that i just did . but i have never seen anybody argue for the opposite. ive never seen anybody say they get off to getting cucked. and im just boldly going to assume you havent seen anyone do that either. of course the 2 of us are not a real sample size to make any statistics with but isnt the logical explanation that people name much more likely then the alternative ? how come this genre is so popular while the fictitious cucks are nowhere to be found ?
Still waiting for the next chapter.

@Amariithynar. nobody uses that term and there isnt even a tag for it as far as i know . neither does typical netorare have to be from the perspective of any one person . there are plenty of netorare that just focus on the girl .As a reader its functionally the same as you arent bound to any one character As far as being on the loosing side i get where you are coming from. nobody would want to be the cuck . but honestly those offended by NTR do so because they identify with the cuck. nothing forces them to not simple take the other side or be an observer. So logically speaking they see something bad happen to someone they identify with and thus hate it . i would hate to be cucked too . but i have no issue with seeing somebody else being cucked
